titleStmt.title: The most pleasante historie, of Albino and Bellama A poeme. To which is annexed the vindication of poesie. by N.W.
Hore di recreatione
titleStmt.author: Whiting, Nathaneel, 1617?-1682.
Dalen, Cornelius van, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed. and are to be sould by Nicho: Fussell,

notesStmt.note: A reissue, with letterpress title page cancelled, and altered engraved title page, of "Le hore di recreatione" (STC 25436).
The title page is signed: Cor: van Dalen. sculp:.
With a final errata leaf; the last two leaves are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
